vote.title: To Celebrate and Recognize the 10th Annual Linden Block Party 614 hosted by WeAreLinden614
vote.description:
Title
 
To Celebrate and Recognize the 10th Annual Linden Block Party 614 hosted by WeAreLinden614
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, WeAreLinden614 is a community-driven organization in Columbus, Ohio, guided by the conviction to “do our part in making the community a better place for all,” and grounded in the empowering principle that the “A.R.E.” in WE ARE LINDEN stands for being Actively Restoring and Empowering the Linden community; and 
 
WHEREAS, through a two-pronged strategy of robust programs—for youth, mentorship, outreach—and inclusive events, WeAreLinden614 works tirelessly to support, uplift, and engage the residents of Linden through meaningful partnerships and collective action; and
 
WHEREAS, the Linden Block Party 614, now entering its 10th annual celebration, has become a hallmark of community spirit—bringing together families, neighbors, partners, and stakeholders for a free, accessible event centered on shared joy, unity, and cultural pride; and
 
WHEREAS, the 2025 10th Annual Linden Block Party 614 is scheduled for Saturday, August 30, 2025, from 12:00 PM to 4:00 PM at St. Stephen’s Community House, located at 1500 E. 17th Avenue, Columbus, OH 43219, and promises an afternoon of fun, music, games, and entertainment for all ages; and
 
WHEREAS, this annual celebration embodies WeAreLinden614’s mission to build healthy relationships across all levels of the community, honoring Linden’s cultural heritage while fostering empowerment, engagement, and positive transformation; now, therefore 
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: that this Council does hereby celebrate and recognize the 10th Annual Linden Block Party 614 and applauds WeAreLinden614 for a decade of dedicated service, for their commitment to being Actively Restoring and Empowering the Linden community, and for creating a lasting legacy of connection, celebration, and hope in the heart of Columbus.
